snippet.title: Daytime Emmy nominations: 'Young and the Restless' leads CBS
snippet.description: The Young and the Restless tallied 23 nominations as honors were announced this morning for the 40th annual Daytime Emmy Awards. Restless' impressive take helped...

snippet.title: 'The Muppets': The Gang's All Here!
snippet.description: Get ready to light the lights! After a decade out of the headlines, The Muppets are back and set to make a new rainbown connection Â— all thanks to one die-hard fan who happens to be a Hollywood star
